title: Leafael Women’s Silver Plated Infinity Love Heart Pendant Necklace with Birthstone Crystals, Jewelry Gifts for Her, 18 + 2 inch Chain, Anniversary Birthday Mother's Necklaces for Wife Mom Girlfriend
description:
Lobster closure
Heart Silver Necklaces - Our Infinity Love heart necklace for women is an original design from our studio in Boston and features a precious Austrian birthstone crystal. All of our jewelry products are polished by hand.
Delicate Fashion Jewelry Gift that Fits - This woman’s necklace is adorned with a 0.75 x 0.88-inch Light Sapphire Blue birthstone for March and December. They are rhodium plated and designed with an 18-inch chain plus 2-inch extender, and a lobster claw clasp.
Strict Safety Standards - These birthstone charms and love gifts meet rigid safety standards. Our jewelry collections pass European 1907/2006 REACH Regulation Annex XVII Item 23,27, and 63, and are lead free, nickel free, and allergy free.
Crystal Necklace for Ladies Like You - Honor your inner royalty with this unique crystal heart pendant necklace. Presented by Miss New York - Nicole Kulovany, this heart necklace is a regal, symbolic statement piece that unveils your feminine spirit.
Thoughtful Gifts for Women and Girls - Looking for exceptional birthday, anniversary, holiday, Christmas, Valentine’s Day, and Mother’s Day gifts for your wife, mom, sister, daughter, or girlfriend? Each Leafael necklace is stored in an elegant white, silver-embossed gift box and gift bag, making it an ideal ladies necklace for the special women or girl in your life.

reviews.name: T. Prentice
reviews.review: I strongly advise NOT to purchase this necklace. Within 6 weeks of wearing the necklace it tarnished and turned an ugly green color. It was a gift to my mom for her birthday. I was completely embarrassed. Do not purchase this for yourself and DEFINITELY NOT for a loved one.

reviews.name: Roberto R.
reviews.reviewTitle: It Does not worth a dollar
reviews.review:
After 2 weeks of use my girlfriend send this pictures to me, I feel so bad because I give her this necklace as a gift and I know it will not be the finest necklace, how ever I certainly hope that It will last longer than 2 weeks, nothing on this necklace worth the shame.

I've learn my lesson... never buy jewelry online!

reviews.name: SnarkyTexan
reviews.review:
My fiancée had gifted this to me for Christmas. I was excited as the color and setting is beautiful. I noticed the metal looked cheap. I didn't see 925 or any karat notes for the quality of the metal. So I checked the post on  before I decided to wear the item 24/7 as I do with gifts from my SO. I was surprised to find that the necklace has a description of “white gold plated" but further down in the details it says brass plated rhodium. No. This is not worth $50! My poor fiancée, who is not very technologically inclined, got duped into purchasing a $10 item for 5x its value! I returned the item immediately before it started turning colors and showed its true value.

Shame on you seller, for your wording. Be honest about what you're selling. Karma will get you eventually.

reviews.name: Andrew
reviews.review: I purchased this for mothers day as a gift for my mother. When I opened it imagine my surprise when inside there was a little plastic bag with 2 broken metal pieces, no heart, nothing. Very upsetting. Idk what happened but I'm doing a return

reviews.name: stacy jenkins
reviews.review: It was a Valentine's day gift and she loves it. Told me she got compliments from everybody who saw it!

reviews.name: Jorge
reviews.review: No sirve duro una semana

reviews.name: D.B.H.
reviews.review: I got this for my wife and she absolutely loves it. The only minor thing is that it tends to flip over exposing the back of the necklace.

reviews.name: Customer
reviews.review: This is my birthstone and my favorite color. I get the most compliments on this necklace. I wear it almost every day

reviews.name: Peter Evans
reviews.review: A gift to my wife for a wedding anniversary which she was delighted to receive. Not the sort of thing I would normally buy online because it’s the kind of gift that you need to see touch and feel but was pleasantly surprised at the quality of the product… lots of house points for me

reviews.name: Pam Carr
reviews.review: Bought this pendant necklace for my friends birthday and she was very pleased.

reviews.name: Customer
reviews.review: Great colour and lovely quality pendant. The chain is flimsy, I threw that away.

reviews.name: mrs j m vine
reviews.review: What great present to get it comes in great sealed box.

reviews.name: Mo
reviews.reviewTitle: Lost its shine after first use
reviews.review: Not worth the money paid for.

title: LANTAI 16-20 Pairs Trendy Acrylic Earrings Rattan Earrings for Women-Summer Beach Straw Woven Earrings Resin Leaf Dangle Drop Earrings Geometric Statement Earrings Vacation Jewelry
description:
PACKAGE - One set 16 pairs earrings including 3 pairs rattan earrings, 1 pairs metal earrings, and 12 pair mottled acrylic earrings. Each pair of earrings is individually packaged.
HYPOALLERGENIC MATERIAL - They are made of high quality material. Lightweight and durable, which won't burden your ears. Lead free, nickel free. Anti-sensitive, reduce skin irritation.
FASHIONABLE EARRINGS BULK -Unique rattan dangle earrings, trendy mottled acrylic earrings enough styles to meet your summer earring needs!
APPLICABLE OCCASIONS - These bohemian style earrings are perfect for daily life wear as well as parties, weddings and celebrations. Unique design matches different styles of clothes, which will makes you look more charming and elegant in the crowds.
PERFECT GIFT - The exquisite earrings are are specially designed for women and girls. You can give them to your girlfriend, wife, mother, daughter, as a gift for Valentine's Day, Mother's Day, Graduation, etc.

reviews.name: dpayne1973
reviews.review: For the price you pay, it's a good value. 9 earrings, which I will probably wear all of them. The ones I might not wear are the ivory rattan/tassels, because the posts are bright white. I may paint them to match, it just doesn't look right together, imo. A lot of reviews say the rattan doesn't match on the sets, mine does. Or that they break easy, so time will tell. For what you pay, even if you wore 2-3 pairs, it's worth it.

reviews.name: Kristin P
reviews.review: I bought this gift for a friend who loves to dress up and go on vacation. These are such a great variety and quality with small plastic packaging for each set and enclosed in a perfect plastic hard case for traveling. I think I’m gonna have to buy some for myself now too I love them.

reviews.name: Pat
reviews.review: I love these so much I bought my best friend a set for Xmas. The value, quantity, and quality is amazing for the price.

reviews.name: Juliejkirk
reviews.reviewTitle: Super cute and doesn’t matter if you lose one!
reviews.review: These are fun + colorful, great variety. They make a great stocking stuffer or a gift add on… Quality is comparable to the price, but I give a 10/10 based on this. Perfect for dressing up a casual outfit or a beach day, etc.

reviews.name: Ligia
reviews.review: Bought these for a cruise and wasn't expecting much. I was pleasantly surprised.

reviews.name: WWAD
reviews.review: Totally worth the money. So fun for vacations, trips with other girls and being able to share and style a new pair every night!!!

reviews.name: Sunni Hart
reviews.review: I absolutely loved this product! I’ve never been a dangling earring person but these earrings are just awesome to wear! These are a must buy!

reviews.name: Rebekah F
reviews.review: Super cute!

reviews.name: Charles Stansell
reviews.review: Quick delivery and gold quality.

reviews.name: Rhonda
reviews.review: Looks nice

reviews.name: X~tina D
reviews.review: I was disappointed when I received this. I thought it would have more "sparkle" to it. You have to make the chocker very tight in order for it to not fall forward. That would be too warm for the Summer months I bought 2 but I'm returning both. Their not what I thought they would be. I was going to gift one, but I don't think my friend would like it either :( sorry.

reviews.name: Pat
reviews.review: I chose this set because I love the design, the looks. But upon arrival, the material looks so cheap, something I could have picked up at a dollar store! I don't know how long it will last before it turns green. I would be willing to pay more for better quality.

reviews.name: Andrea
reviews.review: This item doesn't look as expensive as pictured. The stars and moon placement makes them lay funny. Also as a plus size this did fit tighter than expected.

reviews.name: rowanwynn
reviews.reviewTitle: You het what you pay for
reviews.review: Just got it today...looks just as cheap as it was. Probably not even worth returning for the cost.

reviews.name: Tiffany Besserman
reviews.reviewTitle: Cute for the money, top layer won't sit right.
reviews.review: Cute design but the top layer doesn't lay right. It ALWAYS turns upside down.

reviews.name: Lanna
reviews.review: it didn’t fit right and it didn’t look like the picture and the material was so cheap Not worth buying so disappointing 🤨
